description: A high-tech full-body wetsuit for summer (and shoulder seasons) at most Canadian surf breaks, and for travel to southern latitudes during the colder months.Ultraflex exterior prevents heat loss and cuts the wind.Nanoprene Lite (comes from Japanese limestone) offers high stretch and performance.4mm neoprene torso, 3mm neoprene on legs and arms.Blind-stitched (GBS) seams are triple glued with water-based glue.Interior Thermo Dry Seam Tape reduces leakage and chaffing.Thermolite lining adds insulation and is comfortable next to skin.Fusion X tape reinforces seams at critical stress points.Stretch Duraflex knee panels.Large back panel provides seamless comfort.Water-tight front zip.Water temperature: 11-14 degrees C.
name: Xcel Comp 4/3mm Full-body Wetsuit - Men's
